title: Prince Harry Sent 'Deeply Personal' Letter to Prince Charles | Lorraine
author: Lorraine
description:
Subscribe now for more! http://bit.ly/1KyA9sV
It has been revealed that prior to flying to the UK for his grandfather Prince Philip’s funeral, Harry reached out to his father by sending him a note outlining his reasons for leaving the UK while promising to ‘respect the institution’. So is their relationship on the mend? Royal Editor Russell Myers joins Lorraine with all the latest Royal news.
Broadcast on 20/04/21

Like, follow and subscribe to Lorraine!
Catch up on the ITV Hub: https://bit.ly/2Yvjtyv
Website: http://bit.ly/1E6BlKW
YouTube: http://bit.ly/18cHdtx
Facebook: http://on.fb.me/1E6Bhep
Twitter: https://goo.gl/R5Jxmp

Lorraine brings you up-to-date topical stories, the biggest celebrity interviews and tasty recipes as well as finger-on-the-pulse fashion tips with Mark Heyes and health advice from Dr Hilary Jones.

Presenter Lorraine Kelly welcomes guests in her warm and friendly studio setting as she interviews your favourite celebrity guests and a-list stars as well and delving into the world of food, fashion, health and fun.

Join Lorraine every weekday on ITV and STV at 9.00am.

http://www.itv.com
http://www.stv.tv

ハリーは、祖父フィリップ殿下の葬儀のために英国に飛ぶ前に、「制度を尊重する」ことを約束しながら英国を離れる理由をまとめたメモを父に送り、連絡を取っていたことが明らかになっています。さて、2人の関係は修復されたのでしょうか？ロイヤルエディターのラッセル・マイヤーズがロレインに最新のロイヤルニュースをお届けします。
放送日：4月20日、21日

司会のロレイン・ケリーは、温かく親しみやすいスタジオでゲストを迎え、お気に入りのセレブや有名人にインタビューを行い、食べ物、ファッション、健康、楽しみの世界を掘り下げていきます。

localize.title: ハリー王子がチャールズ皇太子に送った「深い個人的な」手紙｜Lorraine

localize.description:
现在订阅更多！http://bit.ly/1KyA9sV
据透露，在飞往英国参加他祖父菲利普亲王的葬礼之前，哈里向他的父亲伸出了援手，给他发了一张纸条，概述了他离开英国的原因，同时承诺 "尊重这个机构"。那么，他们的关系是否正在恢复中？皇家编辑Russell Myers与Lorraine一起分享所有最新的皇家新闻。
